documents.document: @jperry_cricket @KillerCashy hopefully a marquee game in the summer sun with a few pints ☀
@jperry_cricket @KillerCashy agree mate. great win but ultimate goal was to win tournament or at least finals spot. Interesting summer ahead
@jperry_cricket @KillerCashy your right it's fine margins but same falling came back to haunt them hence the criticism.
@jperry_cricket @KillerCashy way to many people like that! guess that happens in any sport with any defeat.
@jperry_cricket @KillerCashy I'm all for being positive about the game it needs it but was bitterly disappointed to see us fold against IRE
@KillerCashy @jperry_cricket we beat who we should beat in desert T20 and failed when it mattered.Id imagine players and staff would agree.
@jperry_cricket that may well be I don't know wider issues but in recent tournament where was the real positives? Won games we should have
@jperry_cricket I don't know who your referring to but I think we need to be beating Hong Kong regularly Jake. Can't sugar coat defeats.
@MajidHaq @graemewatson1 when you put it like that. Stlll think the Irish seem to have the right structure moving forward.
@MajidHaq @graemewatson1 is that true mate? I was under that impression Ireland had a much larger group of players based down south.
@MajidHaq @graemewatson1 in saying all that you'd hope we'd have the depth to be beating Hong Kong.
@MajidHaq @graemewatson1 Afghan have huge support and opportunity for growth. We are miles behind both countries and it seems to show
@MajidHaq @graemewatson1 it's a to go one boys, Ireland have more county cricketers + 1st class domestic structure on the horizon while
